defaultMessage: Forging is used to validate transactions. Each time you forge you create a new block which allows you to collect all transaction fees in this block. If there are no transactions in a block you will get no fees. The more {tokenName} you have, the higher chance of forging a block. To forge you must have had a minimum of 2,000 {tokenName} in your account for at least 1 day.
Submitting this form will send your private key to the specified node.
